Articles.Content:
It felt dirty how quickly I got rep points (I got 100 in about 3 months), so I feel like spreading the wealth.

What are some crafts you think deserve reputation points?
Only just today I saw the first ever mention of rep I've ever seen. And now this. What's this rep system? I can't see anything related to rep.

It is the green square/rectangle things under your name and title. You give them by clicking on the star at the bottom left of one's post. You get them by posting cool things. It it like karma on Reddit, only a bit harder to get.

My ornithopter that doesn't use the infiniglide bug

Old version

http://imgur.com/a/xIRc4#0

New version

http://imgur.com/a/1P1I6#0

There are no squares or stars or displayed title anywhere that I can find. A format problem maybe?

Here's what I see:

Probably, what browser are you using?

This is what I see with the green squares circled.

Edited April 28, 2014 by Redrobin
This picture made me famous for 15 minutes:

An old F-15 buzzing the trees

A bomber for InfiniteDice's new weapon mod, now ineffective due to some part clipping bugs

P-51 shooting down the aforementioned bomber

An old tank using DYJ gatlinggun that does wheelies!

A favorite of my own crafts, the Ostrich VTOL

There is also a LAGG-3 and a La-15-ish that I have no screenshots of ATM (but maybe soon, if I get any remarkable kills with them )

Alright! Been toying with planes for a week or two now. I decided to make long-range planes, but they turned out to no go very far. So then I decided to fly out fuel planes to multiple destinations. I've never been good at making larger and heavier planes, but I've finally done it!

Here is the "Enabler FT"

Action group 1 activate the forward vertical thrusters and the group 2 toggles the back landing wheels so the craft can pivot up for very short runway takeoffs. (Crucial when you're traversing rough terrain) I use KAS for the fuel transfer. A one-kerbal job.

So, that was pretty cool right? I ask myself shortly after I had used it for a real flight and fuel transfer for my south pole missions, could I make it bigger? Better? More Awesome?!?!? The answer was yes!

I give you, *drumroll*

the "Oasis SFT"

It uses the same principles as it's predecessor, and actually more efficiently if I say so myself. It's been tested and proven. Capable of cruising at 7-10 km at half throttle to save fuel, short landings and takeoffs, and a seriously large fuel payload.

Here it is on it's maiden voyage to KSC 2, with fuel remainder shown.

When KSP enables multiplayer, I am already planning on making mid-flight refueling versions of these with the help of KAS (and a VERY brave kerbal lol) I hope you enjoy!

I was thinking this deserves a lot more rep, at least for all the hours i have spent building and modify it (i think about 50 hours maybe and 30 different versions on my save files XD). It has like 600 downloads but nobody told me yet how she flies: good?, bad? she should have more stability? or more speed? or different aesthetics?

Edited April 28, 2014 by Spartwo

The shuttlecraft that started them all: the SSI Ion (Type-1 Shuttlecraft) Amphibious VTOL capable of undocking at 120km, landing at KSC, and going back up to 120km for re-docking without refueling. The Tesler roadster of the skies, this is SSI's first true shuttlecraft, and the spacecraft that became an inspiration for dozens of engineers. Nothing short of revolutionary when first published, this was the first practical mini SSTO that anyone ever developed in KSP - a counter to Wackjob's projects and a challenge to Levelord's Amphibious VTOL, it set off a design race that exist this very day, to see who can squeeze parts into small footprints while still looking aesthetically pleasing and something you'd want attach to your ship or station.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I've just started up a company to supply Career-mode stock and MechJeb controlled Rockets and Spaceplanes, these are the first 3:

Maximum Returns 1:

Maximum Returns 2:

Maximum Returns 3 (which is really versatile for a ship with only 3 tech nodes unlocked!):

And just today, I filled a request for a Mig-19 that flies pretty well (To be honest, it's amazing - I'm not the best spaceplane pilot, but this thing got me to the island runway and back a couple of times, then I decided to fit 'rockets' to it, which turned out to be more like guided bombs...)

Weaponised:

All are available from my company page: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/77936-A-new-company-arrives-on-the-scene

LKO capable, cargo bay can fit 2.5 meter parts, up to 10 tons. Opening and closing cargo bay doors, all stock.

Link in my sig.

My latest SSTO with excellent flight abilities and enough dV to manage a roundtrip from runway around the mun and back to the KSC.

My most complex craft so far... a complete base consisting of lander, habitat, kethane drill and converter, power system, science system and floodlight tower. It also carried 2 rovers wich could be connected to form a construction vehicle. 4 kerbals landed with the base. And after finishing the mission, the middle section of the ship was separated from the rest of the base via decouplers and served as ascension vehicle.

My best SSTO-VTOL, built for the Duna mission. It is not able to reach orbit on kerbin due to the lack of jet engines, but it can make a descent from duna orbit and get back up without refueling.

It carries 6 kerbals and 4 big KAS containers.
K-Drive. I got a ton of rep through a glitch ship. Felt pretty low for it.
